title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, November 21, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Marilyn French (1929), who wrote fiction and non-fiction about radical feminism including the influential novel “The Women’s Room.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Marilyn French (1929), who wrote fiction and non-fiction about radical feminism including the influential novel “The Women’s Room.”
